entries.name: dequote(str)
entries.desc: Removes quotes and escapes from str

entries.name: mime_type(filename, mime_tab)
entries.desc: Returns the mime type of filename from the list in mime_tab.  If no mime type was found application/octet-stream is returned.

entries.name: normalize_path(path)
entries.desc: Normalizes a request path.  Raises an exception if the path cannot be normalized.

entries.name: parse_form_data(io, boundary)
entries.desc: Parses form data in io with the given boundary

entries.name: parse_header(raw)
entries.desc: Parses an HTTP header raw into a hash of header fields with an Array of values.

entries.name: parse_query(str)
entries.desc: Parses the query component of a URI in str

entries.name: parse_qvalues(value)
entries.desc: Parses q values in value as used in Accept headers.

entries.name: parse_range_header(ranges_specifier)
entries.desc: Parses a Range header value ranges_specifier

entries.name: quote(str)
entries.desc: Quotes and escapes quotes in str

entries.name: split_header_value(str)
entries.desc: Splits a header value str according to HTTP specification.

entries.name: escape(str)
entries.desc: Escapes HTTP reserved and unwise characters in str

entries.name: escape_form(str)
entries.desc: Escapes form reserved characters in str

entries.name: unescape(str)
entries.desc: Unescapes HTTP reserved and unwise characters in str

entries.name: unescape_form(str)
entries.desc: Unescapes form reserved characters in str
